name: Token Teknoloji A.Ş. Token NFT
description: Token NFT (TNFT), launched by Token Teknoloji A.Ş., in 2022, is a thematic basket token that includes multiple cryptocurrencies. This innovative token represents a portfolio of the best NFT tokens that are weighted by experts. TNFT offers its investors an easy and secure way to take the leap into the NFT world. Due to its structure which includes various NFT tokens, TNFT makes it possible to trade a whole portfolio of NFT coins with a single click of a button. With this structure, TNFT is able to minimise the commission fee costs incurred when trading a large number of cryptocurrencies and creates the opportunity to manage a NFT tokens portfolio not only more easily but also more cost-effectively. TNFT, which has advantages such as simple trading, effective market monitoring and low cost, was created on Avax C-Chain. The cryptocurrencies contained in TNFT and their weights are regularly shared transparently on token.com.tr.
